name: 6.2 Actions to Address Risks and Opportunities
description: 6.2.1 When planning for the EnMS, the organization shall consider the issues referred to in 4.1, 4.2, and  outputs of energy review (see 6.3) and determine the risks and opportunities that need to be addressed  to:
